summary: The diff shows a new file (frontend/index.ts) containing the exact code snippet required for REQ-67, and modifications to unrelated files (urlParams.ts utility functions and project_state.json metadata). However, the BuildRequest explicitly specifies that changes must be made to frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx, not frontend/index.ts. The required file was not modified according to the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the forum message display in the Section Detail page (frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx) so that when rendering each message, it shows the author's saved profile name from the authorName field
missing_requirements.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrains changes to frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx. The diff shows the correct code pattern ({msg.authorName || 'Anonymous'}) was added to frontend/index.ts instead. The target file SectionDetailPage.tsx does not appear in the modified files list.

hallucinated_features.description: Added frontend/index.ts file with message rendering code
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies changes should only be made to frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx. Creating a new frontend/index.ts file was not requested and appears to be placing the code in the wrong location.

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to URL parameter utility functions
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constrains changes to only frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx for message rendering. Modifications to frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts (adding URL parameter extraction and session storage utilities) were not requested.
